str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Rich, abounding in, wealthy; subst: a rich man. From ploutos; wealthy; figuratively, abounding with.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (somewhat rare) (of clothing: I put on another); mid: I put on (myself). A prolonged form of enduo; to invest.
Of Latin origin; the 'purple' mussel, i.e. the red-blue color itself, and finally a garment dyed with it.
Fine linen, cotton. Of Hebrew origin; white linen.

word: who lived each day in joyous
parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From eu and phren; to put in a good frame of mind, i.e. Rejoice.
Magnificently, sumptuously, splendidly. Adverb from lampros; brilliantly, i.e. Figuratively, luxuriously.
